horana nagaraya ha ee awata pawathwagena yanu labana osuhal pilibadawa pasugiya kala parichchedayaathulatha noyekuth wiwechana paminili ha wirodhatha pilibandawa wartha wiya.me siduwim kaluthara disa manthri widura wikramanayaka mahathage sabhapathithwayen yuth horana sambandhikarana kamituwe sakachcha kirimedi rajya osuhalak gena eemata godanangillaka awashyathawaya pana nagini.ee sandaha horana nagara sabhawata ayath parani godanangilla labadimata horana nagaradhipathi granwil rajapaksha mahatha pramukha paksha-wipaksha nagarika manthri mandalaya ekangawi atha.me nisa horana nagaraye rajya osuhalak langadima parani nagara sabha godanagille wiwrutha wimata niyamithaya.nagarika sanwardhana adhikariye salasmata anuwa idiwana podu welenda sankirnaya idikirimen pasuwa wadi pahasukam sahithawa rajya osuhala ehi sthapitha kirimatath niyamithaya..
